item.title: KOS
item.description: score:123 Chances: Kosmos Energy Ltd. has a strong portfolio of assets in offshore Ghana, Equatorial Guinea, the U.S. Gulf of Mexico, and gas development offshore Mauritania and Senegal. The company maintains a sustainable exploration program in proven basin infrastructure-led exploration, emerging basins, and frontier basins.
